alert.note: Alert for Conway; Northwest Yell County; Perry; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:18AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Perry, southwestern Conway, central Yell and southern Pope Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 118 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Petit Jean River WMA, or near Danville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Morrilton... Danville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Dover... Ola... London... Hector... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Carden Bottoms... Happy Bend... Mt Nebo State Park... Petit Jean State Park... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Galla Creek WMA... Mosley... Taral... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Northwest Yell County; Perry; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest
